name: Hexagon Fall 3D
description:
Hexagon Fall 3D is a challenging falling racing game. Play against real people and be the last one before all Hex A Gone. Unlock super fun power-ups and get the advantage in the field. Develop new strategies to bamboozle your opponents!

Features:
- Easy to learn and addictive gameplay
- Quality and optimized graphics with real physics.
- So many skins!
- Specially designed hard levels for 1 vs 1 challenge.
- Improved graphics.
- Designed Power-ups to boost your gameplay!

Keep calm and remember do not fall!
Will you be the last one standing?
publishers: Hyperbox Games Yazilim Bilisim Limited Sirketi
